meanings.definition: The act of marginating or being marginated.
meanings.sent1: During the margination, the edges were carefully outlined.
meanings.sent2: The margination of the painting added a nice finishing touch.
meanings.sent3: The margination of the cake with sprinkles made it look like a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughtful margination of the garden beds created a neat and tidy appearance.
meanings.sent5: The margination of the document with colorful tabs made it easy to navigate.

meanings.definition: The process of forming a margin or border.
meanings.sent1: The margination of the page made it look more organized.
meanings.sent2: The margination of the map helped in distinguishing different regions.
meanings.sent3: The margination of the sandwich with lettuce added a fresh touch.
meanings.sent4: The margination of the photo highlighted the subject in the center.
meanings.sent5: The margination of the book cover with a floral pattern was eye-catching.

meanings.definition: The state of being bordered or surrounded by a margin.
meanings.sent1: The margination of the field by trees created a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The margination of the certificate with a gold border made it look prestigious.
meanings.sent3: The margination of the room with fairy lights gave it a magical feel.
meanings.sent4: The margination of the lake by mountains provided a stunning view.
meanings.sent5: The margination of the garden with a fence kept the flowers safe.
